posts.post_content: This is a very solid creature. 3/4 for three Mana is really good. And lifelink on top of it is even better. I'm building up an exalted-deck wich around 75% exalted-creatures in it. *And* Rhox War Monk. This card is not only good, but very flavorful. Artwork, Name, Creature Types, Mana... Everything fits to the others. A very "Bantish" card. Very well done, R&D.

a nice card, good in the cycle, but it doesnt flavor bant too well, I mean, it doesnt have any solo attack ability, it doesnt have exaulted, it makes a good blocker I guess but idk, I like even the windwright mage better, at least it flies with lifelink
